gen:link.msg:message: Reported value of `IntangibleAssets` at end of period SHOULD be equal to sum of reported value of `IntangibleAssets` at beginning of period and changes in that value during period, `IntangibleAssetsMovement`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsInternalExternalGeneratedMovement_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_IntangibleAssetsEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsInternalExternalGeneratedMovement_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_IntangibleAssetsEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsInternalExternalGeneratedMovement_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_IntangibleAssetsStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsInternalExternalGeneratedMovement_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_IntangibleAssetsStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsInternalExternalGeneratedMovement_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_IntangibleAssetsMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsInternalExternalGeneratedMovement_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_IntangibleAssetsMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IntangibleAssetsActualCostPrice` SHOULD NOT be reported, because `IntangibleAssetsCostPrice` is reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsInternalExternalGeneratedMovement_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence1_IntangibleAssetsCostPrice')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsInternalExternalGeneratedMovement_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence1_IntangibleAssetsCostPrice return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsInternalExternalGeneratedMovement_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence1_IntangibleAssetsActualCostPrice')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsInternalExternalGeneratedMovement_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence1_IntangibleAssetsActualCostPrice return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IntangibleAssetsInternallyGeneratedMember` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying children members. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsInternalExternalGeneratedMovement_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract3_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsInternalExternalGeneratedMovement_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract3_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsInternalExternalGeneratedMovement_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract3_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsInternalExternalGeneratedMovement_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract3_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IntangibleAssetsInternallyGeneratedMember` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying children members. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsInternalExternalGeneratedMovement_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract4_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsInternalExternalGeneratedMovement_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract4_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsInternalExternalGeneratedMovement_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract4_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsInternalExternalGeneratedMovement_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract4_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IntangibleAssetsMovement` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsInternalExternalGeneratedMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_IntangibleAssetsMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsInternalExternalGeneratedMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_IntangibleAssetsMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsInternalExternalGeneratedMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsMovementDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsInternalExternalGeneratedMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsMovementDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsInternalExternalGeneratedMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsMovementCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsInternalExternalGeneratedMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsMovementCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IntangibleAssetsNotInternallyGeneratedMember` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying children members. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsInternalExternalGeneratedMovement_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsInternalExternalGeneratedMovement_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsInternalExternalGeneratedMovement_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsInternalExternalGeneratedMovement_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IntangibleAssetsNotInternallyGeneratedMember` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying children members. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsInternalExternalGeneratedMovement_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsInternalExternalGeneratedMovement_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsInternalExternalGeneratedMovement_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsInternalExternalGeneratedMovement_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IntangibleAssets` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsInternalExternalGeneratedMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_IntangibleAssets')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsInternalExternalGeneratedMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_IntangibleAssets return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsInternalExternalGeneratedMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsInternalExternalGeneratedMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsInternalExternalGeneratedMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsInternalExternalGeneratedMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
